name: Blocback (Commodore 64)
description:
Keep the squares from going too far out of bounds!

Use joystick#2 to change direction of the slide

 Up/down for blue square,

Left/Right for red square. 

Merging both squares in the center gets a 25 point bonus!

The squares will move faster as the game goes on. 

Game ends if either square goes past limit.
